scripts.changelog: git fetch && conventional-changelog -p angular -o CHANGELOG.md -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "Update CHANGELOG.md"
scripts.publish: npm install && npm run build && npm run test && lerna publish && ./release.sh
scripts.test:styles: npm run build:styles && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src backstopjs/backstopjs test --configPath=backstop.config.js; open ./backstop_data/html_report/index.html
scripts.test:build:references: npm run build:styles && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src backstopjs/backstopjs reference --i --configPath=backstop.config.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:components && npm run test:styles
